place_description: Contemporary spot serving high-end coffee drinks, plus tea & light fare like toasts & yogurt.

reviews_data.review_text: There is no shock that this place is closed for good

Really good coffee. 
Service was good, not great.
Nice decor and layout.

The coffee is great!
The reason I'm giving 4 stars only is because the pop music they're playing here, is so incredibly loud, it's almost impossible to work.

So, if you just need a coffee on the go, I can highly recommend this place.
Great coffee!

Very pleasant going in but the coffe is not good. I have came in there twice and each time the coffee has not been good. This last time I got the cold brew with caramel. She add hot water to make the caramel melt after adding it to the cold brew it was awful.
The seasonal The Dolly is delicious with a subtle blueberry flavor. Spacious and well lit interior and convenient location. Perfect for an afternoon pick me up.
Coffee and atmosphere great... service could be a little better.
The Strawberry Macha Latte is divine.
No where to sit and do work
Got the best coffee of my life from a girl named Anna. She was super sweet and made me coffee just the way I like it! Happy!
Amazing coffee! And house made syrups??? Say less.   Staff works hard and always provides great service. 10/10 would recommend!
Great cold brew coffee to get the day going, better than all the other places we tried

Horrible Service! 4/24 around noon today. Super saddened by the negative downright rude employee that took our order. I watched other customers come in and be treated the same way. I wont be supporting a business that treats its customers this way. I actually asked other customers in store if they felt the same way I did, and the answer was yes! Sad!

Horrible attitude by the barista who took my order, do yourself a favor and go to their location on 7th street market, they are so friendly over there. Not sure why this location has such horrible customer service. Coffee was great. Won't be back
Perfect cold brew for sunny Saturday
Great coffee ! Espresso was so good!

This one was a miss for me. While the business totes a pride flag in the window which sounds great /accepting, they unfortunately fall short in accessibility. Not only do they not have wheelchair access from the street, but they also do not accept cash payments at all. This leaves their business not easily accessible to people with disabilities and completely inaccessible to young people without cards, a lot of homeless community members & lower income individuals. Of course there is a wheelchair accessible entrance due to ADA laws but you have to enter the building NJC is attached to through heavy double doors with no power open option and take an extremely inconvenient route that is not an option for people with different abilities without some help. I left 2 stars simply because the coffee was good, but customer service and the not so welcoming atmosphere will have me unlikely to return.

Visiting for the weekend and needed to find somewhere to get some work done so I popped in, hoping there'd be a free table, and there was. I'm not really a coffee drinker, but the iced mocha and hot chocolate are both really good. Really great vibe and staff--I'm glad I stopped here.

Customer service was terrible, cashier wasn't helpful and just seemed like she didn't want to be there. Gave me attitude and ruined my experience. Coffee wasn't made the way I asked. If there's going to be horrible service I'd at least expect the coffee to be good. Wouldn't recommend, I'd say walk an extra minute to Waterbean coffee down the street.

Nice place.
Good coffee but I wouldn't eat here again.
Had a toast with jam and an avocado toast. The avocado came with onions, which wasn't said on the menu, and both toasts we're burned.
The vibe is nice and the staff are friendly.

Small coffee with open space in the city center. I was there on a Sunday, and ordered a cappuccino with oat milk and avocado toast/ bread.

Me as a German I have some assumptions about bread in the us, but this "toast" was amazing - it even looked as it was a sourdough. The staff was very friendly and helpful, even asked if I liked the dry tomatoes (no) and pickled onion (do me a favour, and do this!) on the toast.

One star less, because I wish for more diverse range of breakfast options.
The best of all NJC locations! They have the best specialty menu drinks & the staff are all delightful humans
Coffee here is the best
Slow....
Nice staff. Tasty seasonal latte.
Really fantastic coffee, even the decaf. Milk was well steamed and the fall spice latte was complex and not too sweet (I got it half sweet). I'll def be back!! Very cute spot.
''We filter coffee, not people'' quote as good as their coffee!
Amazing little coffee place in Downtown Charlotte, super friendly staff and the coffee and avocado toast were delish!
Hands down the best baristas around but the owner needs to get the dish washer fixed ASAP. You have plenty of money to buy a new one.

We successfully ate here twice and got drinks twice, so four times. We've been three more times and have left without anything because they are literally always sold out now of the biscuit. The biscuit with jam and ricotta is the best. I know it's a smaller building but when you have a top selling item you should stock more of it. I'm going to give up even trying to come here anymore. I would have given 5 stars if I could ever get an order in anymore.

The drinks are decent. I don't like coffee so I get hot chocolate. My fiance seems to enjoy the coffee.

Just overall feels like a much too small location for what business they are doing.
In my many travels across the US and Canada, the best coffee I have tasted so far. The amazingly tasty avocado toast was a bonus.
Nice atmosphere. Coffee is very good. The biscuits were okay.
Ginger chai was a nice change for the traditional chai latte!

I loved to have discovered this coffee shop a block from my work building so I can get my Matcha Latte partially sweetened with honey instead of the horribly sweetened version at Starbucks.   I have tried their scones and they were delicious.  The staff and friendly and the shop seems to always have available seats.

Nice small place with good quality coffee.
I tried one of their seasonal lattes and it was very good.
Great small coffee shop.
Good coffee
Best coffee in the Charlotte area, hands down. This is our bar for when we buy coffee else where.
Really nice and tasty oat milk latte. Great service. :)

It was worth the walk to come here! The lavender honey latte is divine, so flavorful and very nice. The oat milk cappuccino was good but I preferred the lavender latte. You can get any hot drink, iced as well. There is only one size so you don't have to deal with small, medium, large etc. drinks range in price from $4-$6. The avocado toast looked so good but I ran out of arms to carry it out, it would've been about $10. Would recommend and would come again! Sadly o finished my drink before I was able to snag a pic!
Cozy atmosphere and friendly staff. Had a latte and avocado toast. Both were amazing!!  I'm from Maryland but will be back whenever I'm in the area!!

It's a nice place to go and get your morning coffee. I stayed there to do some work, wifi was good. I had the seasonal Honey Lavender Latte and ugh it was good. The baristas here had a rush hour but they A's it they are really good and welcoming.
Tasty cold brew

Switched up my morning routine and ordered a strawberry matcha iced bev. The presentation was nice and the drink was really good! It's a nice sized space with WiFi if you need a working space for a short while.
Avocado toast and oat milk cappuccino is the way to go.  Friendly folks that are crafting great concoctions, so worth the trip.
The cappuccino with oatmeal milk was excellent, as well as the avocado toasts! I'm very picky with my coffee, so believe me when I say the coffee here is excellent!
Good little spot, semi hidden in a big wall. Avacado toast was great. Americano was good. Small counters, you could hide from coworkers here and get stuff done on the computer I'm sure.
Nice
Cute little coffee shop on my trip to downtown Charlotte! Excellent customer service & unique selection.
If you are Hispanics do not come here. The male barista has a resting beachss face for Hispanics
Thank you, Noah.  Got the best coffee and most amazing service at this location!
Great place with delicious coffee and welcoming staff.

Stopped in for a quick oat milk latte before headed home to Canada and it was delicious. High quality espresso and ingredients overall. The space was clean and nicely put together and staff were friendly. Great start to the morning.
Great coffee!
Great coffee, great staff, excellent location.

Do yourself a favor and go by this coffee shop! Not only do that have awesome staff and great atmosphere, but the coffee and food is delicious! I highly recommend biscuit with ricotta and jam (only on weekends)
Really good coffee

Thank you beautiful barista for the delicious cup of coffee that awakened me the day after what seemed a very long drive from Tallahassee. And thank you for the comfortable seat outside that allowed my pup and I to imbibe in peace and watch the goings on while drinking it.
Delicious lattes and scones and friendly service/cute ambiance.

Love this place! I've been here a lot of times and it is always soo good. The staff is super friendly and their coffee is the best. Syrups are made in house and I love cookies so of course I had to get one of those too. They have other food/menu items also, their avocado toast is great.
Good place but not alot of tables
Great avo toast and great drinks
$5 for a mediocre cafe cortado was honestly a bit heavy. I was a bit disappointed in what I got for the price I paid.
Quick and fast! Great taste and awesome staff (they helped us figure out what we wanted to order and were super patient)!!

Omg omg this feelin's just begun. I was looking for a Starbucks but magically I was guided to 'Not Just Coffee' and boy were my angels looking out for me! I ordered the iced Americano and the lemon lavender scone. The first sip of perfect iced espresso and all of the unique clientele is the perfect vibe for this NYC artist to feel at home. Next time I'll order the Japanese Iced coffee...mmmm!!

Go here for the expertise, love, and care about when coffee can be at its best.

Don't come here if you need cookie cutter frapaccino...

This place is an experience to be enjoyed when in Charolette.
Great cappuccino!

Good coffee quality but customer service is bad enough that I will never go back. Got my order wrong. Then told me I was wrong, despite my receipt being correct to what I ordered (they got it wrong) wouldn't re make it. And charged me more than I should have. Super disappointed ting for a cute looking place

Serving Counter Culture coffee, NJC holds it's own with a solid avo toast option (get it with the pickled onions and sun dried tomatoes). Since it's without a full kitchen, eggs for the biscuits (served on weekends) is not an option. Great vibes all around!
Really good coffee and breakfast
Excellent
As good as it gets. Try the specialty drinks.  The dolly latte was amazing...
Tasty coffee and light fare in a bougie little shop.
Best cold brew in charlotte
Ordered a large drink and he filled it up enough for a small. I asked him to top it off and he said he can only add more ice. Cheap.

I really don't have anything else to say other than Thank you for making drinks so good , so satisfying. Ginger Chai Tea was amazing!!! What, fresh ginger! Music to my ears. I decided to have Coffee and is amazing as well, haven't drink such a pleasant coffee cup since ever.  Made my day. Thank you. By the way, love the wood table design.
Great coffee, delicious avocado toast. Nice work!
Not Just Coffee is one of those rare coffee shops in CLT that get cappuccino right...right texture, right taste...
Iced tea with 80% ice
Great coffee, cozy & quiet vibes. I recommend it
Pleasant staff!  Great cold brew and lox toast was wonderful!  Worth a try
Great place

Cute lay out. Maybe they have online orders? Because there weren't that many people & it took awhile. The guy who cashed us out wasn't friendly but the other one was nice(: I tried some speciality dream drink, personally for me it wasn't drinkable so I wouldn't recommended. But the caramel latte was great!!

The space is light and airy with warm, blonde wood tones and fun, modern urban jazz-punk instrumentals play in the background. The baristas are friendly and patient, and the food is delicious. I had the lox toast and a cappuccino, and both were perfectly balanced in flavor and appropriate, light portions, and as aesthetically pleasing as they are scrumptious.

If I'm in Charlotte again, I'll definitely come back.
Open airey space with friendly service.

Title says it all. They practice exactly what they preach & it's much appreciated. Love the #counterculture movement. I got a mocha latte which was made to perfection! Service was good and vibes were awesome as well. I definitely recommend it.
delicious coffee, friendly staff!
Best in the city. Not just great coffee, but fantastic baristas too.
Great counter culture roasted coffee, solid late art.
Coffee is perfect. Tea is good.

Stellar coffee brewed just right. Oat Milk Latte with their custom made vanilla sugar was creamy and flavorful without being so sweet that the flavor notes in the coffee are overwhelmed (unlike the lattes made at major chain coffee houses).

About what you expect from a typical coffee shop. Politics hitting you in the face before you can even smell the coffee. Roughly 4 dollars for a small cup of decent coffee. Nothing terrible nothing special. Just meh.
Great service and fantastic coffee! My favorite spot in Charlotte!
Had a delicious latte that wouldn't be mistaken for a cappuccino or a flat white. Silky microfoam on perfectly steamed milk, and a full-bodied, but not over roasted espesso. I highly recommend.
Super friendly staff, and the coffee & pop tarts are amazing!
Best caramel lattes as always.
Just like any other NJC, the coffee and ambience is nothing short of perfection. I get wonderful service every time I come In and i love it.

Have already done multiple photoshoots inside/outside this coffee shop. I keep coming back not just for the vibes but for the coffee! They have oat milk which is great option and their coffee is amazing! I recently tried their hot chocolate with oat milk and it was perfect! Just enough sweetness! The staff is also very kind and super friendly. They make designs in every single cup and it always looks great! Will be coming back of course since I already do!

Really nice coffee and conversation place. The inside is extremely small and seating is limited, so we had to wait a little while before seating to become available. The vanilla latte and caramel latte were extremely rich and tasted great!
Nothing special. Soda was good but mostly ice. Tea mediocre for the price. The coffe had a very weird after taste, perhaps from the almond milk that left a burt butter taste.
The coffee wasn't that great, it's a small place and not enough options. You are better off at Starbucks or Dunkin Donut.

I live in FL but my husband and I are always on the lookout for great coffee. Not Just Coffee was recommended to us so we tried it out this morning. I ordered a pour over and one of the baristas whipped it up to the best of her ability. She served it up to me and a man (assuming the owner or manager?) saw it wasn't up to par with their standards. He insisted on redoing it for me. So he re-did it while walking the girl through every step. His desire for high quality was so admirable and I loved how he graciously trained the girl that is still learning. Love small businesses like this!! My husband with very high standards (regarding coffee) said "best pour over I ever had." Highly recommend!!!

Coffee was great (latte with almond milk), had no burnt taste that often comes with a straight almond latte. Wifi is fast and free w/ password. They have incredible almond croissants (try warm) and limited food options but I got the avocado toast (with dried tomatoes) which was a tad too oily for my personal preference but the taste but still on point. Staff are real friendly, let me stay there for probably way too long (including my 40ltr backpack) while waiting for a pal. Thanks Guys!

Just by looking at how well they did the exterior design on the front of this place you really feel like you just got to hop right on in.  It is Not Just Coffee.  Do you know what else they do here...

Small engine repair
They sharpen ice skates
They will clean your cat's litter box for you
They have a person who is an astrophysicist who will tell you all about stars
They have a person who will teach you Krav Maga
They have a person here who will fold your laundry so well that you will not want to ever un fold it.
They have a giant TYRANNOSAURUS REX HERE RAAAAAAAAAAAAR
Easy going, quiet, and gotta love the designs!
Awesome place!
Visited near twelve, it was not full. The service was helpful and kind. It has a nice feel to it. Menu is like a place in San Francisco I liked.

A careful coffee spot,  with high standards and friendly staff.  I had a really good double espresso, and a perfect avocado toast - on super fresh and beautifully toasted sourdough.   Food selection is limited, so it's not really a full on cafe.

I've been going to NJC for a couple of years now. Always spectacular coffee! I appreciate their attention to detail and enthusiasm towards making coffee, but i think it's gotten in the way of getting the drinks out in a reasonable time. I want my espresso quick, I shouldn't have to wait for them to pull 2-3 shots before they decide it's good enough for me to drink.
Coffee is Australian/ italian style barista. Very good if you like that type of coffee.
Great customer service. Extremely friendly staff.
One of the best coffee shops in Charlotte, if not the best.  They know what they are doing.
Nice place good stuff
A classic small coffee shop.
Great coffee!
Service and Environment is great! Serves Counter Culture coffee which is why I gave it 5 stars.
Wonderful morning spot for coffee and pastry
Great coffee! Nice folks, a great reputation and we love the place!

Hmmm, not really impressed. I was visiting Charlotte and tried this place based on reviews. I'm not sure why it's highly rated. Perhaps you need to be a local to feel impressed. I felt this place was just meh. The coffee was good and the best part. I had the vanilla sugar latte that was mentioned in reviews. People smiled when I ordered, but didn't really make conversation. The atmosphere was boring and bland with super uncomfortable chairs and high tables. This is not a place to hangout and relax while drinking your coffee. I should have gotten my coffee to go. Not a place I would go out of my way to repeat.
Awesome Coffee and Tea. And Beautiful STAFF!!!!!
Great coffee nice place good service

I try to mostly support locally owned cafes more then chains because I work at one and know how much love and care they put Into what they do. This place does just that. Amazing coffee amazing avocado toast! Super cute environment.
The friendliest coffee shop. The people here are so kind and the coffee is delicious.
Cool little coffee shop.

Great customer service. Extremely friendly staff. The baristas walked us through the menu and even suggested great local eats for us to try around the city. I ordered the house coffee with the fall spice blend and it was the perfect combination of warmth and sweetness.
Ideal place 4 a gr8 conversation and some exquisite gourmet teas..very comfortable & posh experience!
Latte is very smooth

This was my first time visiting this location but as always the caramel latte was beautiful and delicious. Also the the place had the usual clean minimalistic style paired with a quiet environment good for working on something.
On my list for now is to try every thing on their menu which is Not Just Coffee. The ambience suits to work pleasantly with some background music  The coffee in the pic I posted is Matcha Latte
Best coffee and staff in town. Also a great place to get work done away from work.

What Starbucks...??? Just as I've grown to love craft beer I've grown to love this place because it's  "Not Just Coffee" (pun intended). This is local craft brewery equivalent of coffee and every sip is simply delicious.

Expect a wait no matter how long or short a line is because they take their time and put love in your coffee.

The only drawback is that they do not have an app in order to preorder so that it's ready when you get here. They have an app for Apple users but none for Android. Nonetheless it's always worth the wait and always delicious!
Not Just Coffee is the best! No matter the location you go to the coffee and staff are awesome.
Great Americano

Small coffee shop on the edge of uptown Charlotte. Not a huge menu selection, but the quality of the brews they are providing are above and beyond any Starbucks. Have a few selections for food, but this place is where to go for a delicious caffeine boost.
Awesome sauce coffee and coffee makers.
The best coffee in Charlotte. Good vibes, feels cool, looks cool, and is near everything in Uptown. Will always love this place.
I'll be damned if this isn't my favorite coffee shop in Charlotte, and maybe even the southeast.
Overpriced. But decent coffee
I got the Butter rum cappuccino. A very stylistic way to enjoy a nice cappuccino. The housemade butter rum topped with cracked black pepper gives it a unique twist. Enjoy and #wakeup.
Amazing amazing coffee! Their specials are a must try! Their baristas are so knowledgeable and have so much knowledge & skill with their craft. Also great service!
May not be just coffee, but the coffee is great! The toast selection was amazing, and great conversations with the staff!
Very nice place!
Way to much pomp for a cup of tea
Friendliest baristas ever. Period.
Had an absolutely wonderful Chai tea latte there

My new favorite place to get amazing coffee! I can grab some before class if I'm in a hurry or sit and drink it there. Seating is kinda limited though, only a few bar seats and a large table...but still, love it! (Best chai in Charlotte!)
Staff were kind of full of themselves and had attitude. Coffee was good. The small dishes were not so impressive. Overall, would not go back.
Coffee and food were delicious, and that was agreed upon by 4 people from all parts of the country! Great local spot with great service.
By far the best coffee in Charlotte. They care about what they do.
Love the atmosphere and the very friendly and kind staff, adored a delicious peach pop tart, but unfortunately didn't love the coffee! I don't care though, I'd absolutely go back again.
Good counter culture coffee, best Americano I've had in awhile, and a friendly staff
Best coffee in Charlotte! #EnoughSaid
The pour overs, espresso, and friendly folks there are on point
The pour overs are tasty!
My wife and I stopped by this coffee spot while taking a stroll uptown. The place is very comfy with a good view outside. Coffee was outstanding and the service was excellent.

Love, Love, Love. This is a new spot for me. I will be back often! The service was great. I ordered the Goat cheese and fig toast and it was made with love; he definitely put his heart into making it perfect! The coffee was smooth and full bodied: better than Starbucks and Amelie's.
Excellent coffee, chill atmosphere. Try the goat cheese toast.
Crafted coffees, great service, and freshly roasted beans. Go off-menu and ask the barista for a recommendation.
Friendly staff and great coffee!  Relaxed atmosphere with a good amount of seating. The barista was very helpful when I couldn't decide what I wanted.
Walk an extra 500ft. to get real coffee.  If there's a cortado on the menu, you know they're serious.  They are.

I work in uptown Charlotte (actually across the street from NJC) and I stop by EVERY morning to pick up a cup of their cold brew. This morning they were having plumbing issues and instead of putting up a "Sorry We're Closed" sign on the front door - they had an employee standing in the doorway, explaining the situation, AND offering customers a FREE cup of coffee. Talk about awesome customer service! These guys rock and not to mention, they have the best coffee in all uptown Charlotte. Thanks guys at NJC!
Nice surprise in Charlotte uptown. Feeling home
Love the coffee. Counter culture

If you're visiting Charlotte for the first time, go to Amelie's instead! If you've already been there, then this place is definitely worth a visit if trendy coffee shops are your thing. The line can get a little long, but you can pass the time by gazing into the fancy incandescent light bulbs.
Trendiest place I've ever been for coffee
There is more food than they advertise in the display case and the cinnamon toast is incredible.
A small but amazing coffee spot that features an espresso guaranteed to buzz you to life! Good WiFi and desks for working, as well as a small patio.
Great coffee and a very good atmosphere
Some of the best coffee I've ever had; best in Charlotte for sure. Love the place and the people are nice; for true coffee lovers this is the spot!
Great coffee shop right in the bottom of Packard Place. Excellent coffee!
Delightful place with good coffee, tea and music. Great service too!
The coffee is great. Can be a line worth it

Just had literally the best latte I've ever had. They have natural simple syrup infused with vanilla bean, which adds the perfect (not overpowering or artificial) sweetness. The milk was foamed to perfection. If you are in the area and enjoy great coffee, don't pass this place by!
Really good coffee.
Extremely helpful & friendly staff. You feel very welcomed here. I will be back soon!
The location is awesome! Especially with the food option! I love it! The staff is always friendly and the coffee is spot-on every time. Consistency is key!
Lovely people and amazing coffee, my favorite coffee shop
Nice little coffee shop in Uptown. Much nicer feel than Starbucks or the Dunkin' Donuts on Graham. The staff is super nice and the coffee and tea are really great.
One of the best places to get quality coffee in Charlotte. James and his wife have really started something special here. Heading to get some Not Just Coffee as we speak.
Great coffee, croissants, and atmosphere!

The stools are not comfortable for those who are vertically challenged or well endowed in the posterior anatomy. I really wish they had a few tables and chairs other than the ones outside. The decor is pretty bland and uneventful, but that's just my opinion. Otherwise, they still have some of the best coffee in the area. I do wish there was also more bicycle parking, especially considering their proximity to the park. Due to this, I'll probably stick to the 7th Street and Atherton locations.
Best coffee ever. Lattes are delicious
Good spot to chill
Great place for quality crafted coffee and a bright atmosphere. Service was excellent for me. Definitely will return.
I love their coffee. Tried their cold brew for the first time on this visit and it was fantastic as expected.
